items.content_html: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features an interactive UI, real-time turn-based gameplay, automatic win/draw detection, and a reset function. The game is lightweight, responsive, and demonstrates core web development concepts like DOM manipulation and event handling.
items.title: PriyanshMasiyava/TicTacToe_game: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features an interactive UI, real-time turn-based gameplay, automatic win/draw detection, and a reset function. The game is lightweight, responsive, and demonstrates core web development concepts like DOM manipulation and event handling.
